verses.verse: 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "The gate<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> facing<WH6437> east<WH6921> shall be shut<WH5462> the six<WH8337> working<WH4639> days;<WH3117> but it shall be opened<WH6605> on the sabbath<WH7676> day,<WH3117> and opened<WH6605> on the day<WH3117> of the new<WH2320> moon.<WH2320>

"And the prince<WH5387> shall enter<WH935> by way<WH1870> of the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> from outside<WH2351> and stand<WH5975> by the post<WH4201> of the gate.<WH8179> Then the priests<WH3548> shall provide<WH6213> his burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and his peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> and he shall worship<WH7812> at the threshold<WH4670> of the gate<WH8179> and then go<WH3318> out; but the gate<WH8179> shall not be shut<WH5462> until<WH5704> the evening.<WH6153>

"The people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall also worship<WH7812> at the doorway<WH6607> of that gate<WH8179> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> on the sabbaths<WH7676> and on the new<WH2320> moons.<WH2320>

"And the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> which<WH834> the prince<WH5387> shall offer<WH7126> to the Lord<WH3068> on the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> shall be six<WH8337> lambs<WH3532> without<WH8549> blemish<WH8549> and a ram<WH352> without<WH8549> blemish;<WH8549>

and the grain offering<WH4503> shall be an ephah<WH374> with the ram,<WH352> and the grain offering<WH4503> with the lambs<WH3532> as much<WH3027> as he is able<WH3027> to give,<WH4991> and a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> with an ephah.<WH374>

"And on the day<WH3117> of the new<WH2320> moon<WH2320> [he shall offer] a young<WH1121> bull<WH6499> without<WH8549> blemish,<WH8549> also six<WH8337> lambs<WH3532> and a ram,<WH352> [which] shall be without<WH8549> blemish.<WH8549>

"And he shall provide<WH6213> a grain offering,<WH4503> an ephah<WH374> with the bull,<WH6499> and an ephah<WH374> with the ram,<WH352> and with the lambs<WH3532> as much<WH3027> as he is able,<WH5381> <WH3027> and a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> with an ephah.<WH374>
"And when the prince<WH5387> enters,<WH935> he shall go<WH935> in by way<WH1870> of the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> and go<WH3318> out by the same way.<WH1870>

"But when the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> come<WH935> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> at the appointed<WH4150> feasts,<WH4150> he who enters<WH935> by way<WH1870> of the north<WH6828> gate<WH8179> to worship<WH7812> shall go<WH3318> out by way<WH1870> of the south<WH5045> gate.<WH8179> And he who enters<WH935> by way<WH1870> of the south<WH5045> gate<WH8179> shall go<WH3318> out by way<WH1870> of the north<WH6828> gate.<WH8179> No<WH3808> one shall return<WH7725> by way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> by which<WH834> he entered<WH935> but shall go<WH3318> straight<WH3318> out.
"And when they go<WH935> in, the prince<WH5387> shall go<WH935> in among<WH8432> them; and when they go<WH3318> out, he shall go<WH3318> out.

"And at the festivals<WH2282> and the appointed<WH4150> feasts<WH4150> the grain offering<WH4503> shall be an ephah<WH374> with a bull<WH6499> and an ephah<WH374> with a ram,<WH352> and with the lambs<WH3532> as much<WH3027> as one is able<WH3027> to give,<WH4991> and a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> with an ephah.<WH374>

"And when<WH3588> the prince<WH5387> provides<WH6213> a freewill<WH5071> offering,<WH5071> a burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> or<WH176> peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> [as] a freewill<WH5071> offering<WH5071> to the Lord,<WH3068> the gate<WH8179> facing<WH6437> east<WH6921> shall be opened<WH6605> for him. And he shall provide<WH6213> his burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and his peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> as he does<WH6213> on the sabbath<WH7676> day.<WH3117> Then he shall go<WH3318> out, and the gate<WH8179> shall be shut<WH5462> after<WH310> he goes<WH3318> out.

"And you shall provide<WH6213> a lamb<WH3532> a year<WH8141> old<WH1121> without<WH8549> blemish<WH8549> for a burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> to the Lord<WH3068> daily;<WH3117> morning<WH1242> by morning<WH1242> you shall provide<WH6213> it.

"Also you shall provide<WH6213> a grain offering<WH4503> with it morning<WH1242> by morning,<WH1242> a sixth<WH8345> of an ephah,<WH374> and a third<WH7992> of a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> to moisten<WH7450> the fine<WH5560> flour,<WH5560> a grain offering<WH4503> to the Lord<WH3068> continually<WH8548> by a perpetual<WH5769> ordinance.<WH2708>
"Thus they shall provide<WH6213> the lamb,<WH3532> the grain offering,<WH4503> and the oil,<WH8081> morning<WH1242> by morning,<WH1242> for a continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering.<WH5930>"

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "If<WH3588> the prince<WH5387> gives<WH5414> a gift<WH4979> [out of] his inheritance<WH5159> to any<WH376> of his sons,<WH1121> it shall belong<WH1961> to his sons;<WH1121> it is their possession<WH272> by inheritance.<WH5159>

"But if<WH3588> he gives<WH5414> a gift<WH4979> from his inheritance<WH5159> to one<WH259> of his servants,<WH5650> it shall be his until<WH5704> the year<WH8141> of liberty;<WH1865> then it shall return<WH7725> to the prince.<WH5387> His inheritance<WH5159> [shall be] only<WH389> his sons'; it shall belong<WH1961> to them.

"And the prince<WH5387> shall not take<WH3947> from the people<WH5971>'s inheritance,<WH5159> thrusting<WH3238> them out of their possession;<WH272> he shall give<WH5157> his sons<WH1121> inheritance<WH5157> from his own possession<WH272> so<WH4616> that My people shall not be scattered,<WH6327> anyone<WH376> from his possession.<WH272>"' "

Then he brought<WH935> me through the entrance,<WH3996> which<WH834> [was] at the side<WH3802> of the gate,<WH8179> into the holy<WH6944> chambers<WH3957> for the priests,<WH3548> which faced<WH6437> north;<WH6828> and behold,<WH2009> there<WH8033> [was] a place<WH4725> at the extreme<WH3411> rear<WH3411> toward the west.<WH3220>

And he said<WH559> to me, "This<WH2088> is the place<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> the priests<WH3548> shall boil<WH1310> the guilt<WH817> offering<WH817> and the sin<WH9128> offering,<WH9128> [and] where<WH834> they shall bake<WH644> the grain offering,<WH4503> in order that they may not bring<WH3318> [them] out into the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> to transmit<WH6942> holiness<WH6942> to the people.<WH5971>"

Then he brought<WH3318> me out into the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> and led<WH5674> me across<WH5674> to the four<WH702> corners<WH4740> of the court;<WH2691> and behold,<WH2009> in every<WH4740> corner<WH4740> of the court<WH2691> [there was] a [ small] court.<WH2691>

In the four<WH702> corners<WH4740> of the court<WH2691> [there were] enclosed<WH7000> courts,<WH2691> forty<WH705> [cubits] long<WH753> and thirty<WH7970> wide;<WH7341> these four<WH702> in the corners<WH9525> [were] the same<WH259> size.<WH4060>

And [there was] a row<WH2905> [of masonry] round<WH5439> about<WH5439> in them, around<WH5439> the four<WH702> of them, and boiling<WH4018> places<WH4018> were made<WH6213> under<WH8478> the rows<WH2918> round<WH5439> about.<WH5439>

Then he said<WH559> to me, "These<WH428> are the boiling<WH1310> places<WH1004> where<WH834> <WH8033> the ministers<WH8334> of the house<WH1004> shall boil<WH1310> the sacrifices<WH2077> of the people.<WH5971>"
